name: Winter Sports Games
description:
Hit the snow!

Whether you enjoy skiing, the thrill of barrelling down an ice track in a bobsleigh or sled, or calmly sliding the stones across the ice in curling – you can have it all here.

Win tournaments and master challenges in six tense disciplines. Play by yourself or with up to four players at your home – no runny nose after every competition!

Features
- 6 tense disciplines:
- Ski jumping
- Slalom skiing
- Downhill skiing
- Bobsledding
- Sledding
- Curling
- Local multiplayer for 2 to 4 players
- Modern graphics and classic controls
